# Global flag placement and propagation
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite --json add From global json
stdout '"title":"From global json"'

exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite --json list
stdout '"title":"From global json"'

exec ugh --config $WORK/custom.toml config set db.path relative/ugh.sqlite
exists $WORK/custom.toml

exec ugh --config $WORK/custom.toml config get db.path
stdout 'relative/ugh.sqlite'
